E'a:
Watermark E'.a. can be distinguished by three round jewels in the lower band of the crown.

________________________________________________________________________

This watermark can be found on the following prints:

  • Self-Portrait in a velvet cap with plume, 1638, (B. 20 only/NHD 170 ii), Hermitage Museum, St. Petersburg (HMP 234913). Folio sheet.
  • Girl with a basket, c. 1642, (B. 356 ii, NHD 209 iii), Rijksprentenkabinet, Amsterdam (RPK OB.753). Quarto sheet.

(Erik Hinterding, Rembrandt as an Etcher, 2006, II, 64)
